name: dokku
tagline: A lightweight platform for deploying applications with git-based workflows
description: Dokku is a small PaaS built on Docker that lets you deploy apps using git push. It supports buildpacks, environment config, plugins, and multiple languages, providing a Heroku-like workflow on your own server with minimal overhead.

features.title: Git Push Deployment
features.description: Deploy applications by pushing code to a Git remote without manual build steps or configuration

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with community plugins for databases, caching, monitoring, and additional services

features.title: Environment Management
features.description: Configure application settings using environment variables without modifying code

features.title: Database Linking
features.description: Provision and connect PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis, and other databases with single commands
